resources.string: 3.How many years have you been in clinical practice?
4.What is the type of your practice currently work in?
5.What percentage of your clinical practice is involved in treating patients with lung cancer?
6.How many new lung cancer patients do you see in a month?
7.How many existing lung cancer patients do you see in a month?
8.Which is the most common histology of lung cancer in your practice?
Non small cell lung cancer NOS
9.What percentage of the patients you see have metastatic lung cancer?
10.What is the most common diagnostic modality of lung cancer you found in your day to day practice?
11.What is the main challenge for not taking biopsy from lung mass?
Lack of knowledge about it’s importance
12.\tDo you offer PET-CT scan to each lung cancer patient for staging work up?
13.Which is your first consideration of chemotherapy in metastatic squamous cell carcinoma of lung?
14.Which is your first consideration of chemotherapy in metastatic adeno carcinoma of lung?
15.Which is your first consideration of chemotherapy in small cell carcinoma of lung?
16.If EGFR positive adeno ca lung, which is your preferred TKI?
All are same in terms of efficacy
17.What is your preferred EGFR testing procedure?
18.Do you use TKI blindly in lung cancer?
19.What is your preferred 1st line chemotherapy regimen if the diagnosis is metastatic NSCLC,not otherwise specified?
20.Do you use combination chemotherapy in metastatic lung cancer in ECOG 2 performance status?
21.Do u think that immunotherapy is also an important modality of lung cancer?
22.\tWhat do you think that these immunotherapeutic drugs should be fit in which part of treatment algorithm (if cost is not an issue)?
23.Any comment or suggestion regarding Lung cancer management in Bangladesh.
